about_the_game:
Experience the journey of being a porn addict. Wade through possible relationships, nightclubs, and dream sequences as you come to terms with how this addiction came to be and eventually your choices will determine how or even if you manage to break free from addiction.

Features:
• One hour long highly emotional roller coaster
• Seven different endings
• Unique hand-drawn art using digital oil paint
• Over 50 drawings to be seen. Plenty are unique to the choices you make!
• Soundtrack included within game folders
• Access script files in RenPy to see how it was put together

content_descriptors.notes: Features sexual violence against a newborn male.

detailed_description:
Experience the journey of being a porn addict. Wade through possible relationships, nightclubs, and dream sequences as you come to terms with how this addiction came to be and eventually your choices will determine how or even if you manage to break free from addiction.

Features:
• One hour long highly emotional roller coaster
• Seven different endings
• Unique hand-drawn art using digital oil paint
• Over 50 drawings to be seen. Plenty are unique to the choices you make!
• Soundtrack included within game folders
• Access script files in RenPy to see how it was put together
legal_notice:
All music in-game (and in the trailer) retains copyright to their respective creators (credits file found in game folders).

Everything else is owned by Cleril Calamity Studios.

Sexualisierte Gewalt / Sexual violence
Drastische Gewalt
Drogen

reviews:
“It is quite possibly one of the most disturbing video games ever made.”
4.5 – Operation Rainfall

“It’s blunt and crude in that way brutal honesty often is, and credit goes to the developer -- one man outfit, Cleril Calamity Studios -- for not shying away from courting controversy”
Honest Gamers
short_description: Experience the journey of being a porn addict. Wade through possible relationships, nightclubs, and dream sequences as you come to terms with how this addiction came to be and eventually your choices will determine how or even if you manage to break free from addiction.
